definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: corn, grain (of cereals) (NH id., Sam. dgn v. Thes.; cf. Ph. [[ארחת דגן]])—[[דָּגׇן]] Ge 27:28 + 29 t.; cstr. [[דְּגַן]] Ps 78:24; sf. [[דְּגׇנִי]] Ho 2:11, [[דְּגׇֽנְךָ]] De 7:13, De 12:17, De 14:23, De 18:4, [[דְּגׇנֶ֑ךָ]] De 11:14, [[דְּגׇנֵךְ]] Is 62:8, [[דְּגׇנׇם]] Ps 4:8, Ps 65:10—corn, c. [[תִּירוֹשׁ]] must, q.v., Ge 27:28, Ge 27:37 (both J) Ps 4:8, Is 62:8, Ho 2:11, Ho 7:14, Ho 9:1, Zec 9:17; cf. also Nu 18:27 (P; here, for [[תירושׁ]], [[מְלֵאָה מִן־הַיׇּ֑קֶב]]), La 2:12 (where [[יַיִן]]), Ho 14:8 (where [[גֶּפֶן]] & [[לְבָנוֹן יֵין]]); [[ארץ דגן ותירושׁ]] of land of Canaan De 33:28; of land of captiv. (words of the Rabshak) 2Ki 18:32 = Is 36:17 (other products, also, named in both); usually c. [[תירושׁ]] & [[יחהר]] Nu 18:12, De 7:13, De 11:14, De 12:17, De 14:23, De 18:4, De 28:51, 2Ch 31:5 (+ [[דבשׁ]]) 2Ch 32:28, Ne 5:11, Ne 10:40, Ne 13:5, Ne 13:12, Je 31:12, Ho 2:10, Ho 2:24, Joe 1:10, Joe 2:19, Hag 1:11; also Joe 1:17 Me; (cf. 2Ki 18:32, Is 36:17 supr.); alone, rare and late Ne 5:2, Ne 5:3, Ne 5:10, Ps 65:10, Ez Eze 36:29; [[דְּגַן־שָׁמַיִם]] Ps 78:24; —of the above the following refer to firstfruits offered to the priests Nu 18:12 (cf. v:Nu 18:27) De 18:4, 2Ch 31:5; to tithe De 12:17, De 14:23, Ne 13:5, Ne 13:12; to both generally Ne 10:40; to loaning on usury Ne 5:10, Ne 5:11.
